title: Organically Raised: Conscious Cooking for Babies
description:
Organically Raised: Conscious Cooking for Babies and Toddlers by Anni Daulter and Shante Lanay

Overview: A cookbook with a conscience, Organically Raised by Anni Daulter with ShantÃƒÂ© Lanay shows parents how to replace bland processed shelf staples with flavorful, pesticide-free meals that babies will love, laying the groundwork for a lifetime of good nutrition and enthusiastic eating.
Organically Raised shows families how easy it is to make safe, wholesome food at home and create lasting family mealtime rituals. The simple, seasonal purÃƒÂ©es for new babies and inventive recipes from around the world for toddlers and young children provide parents with all of the tools they need to raise adventurous eaters.
The cookbook also includes important information about nutrition for children, common food allergies, a handy feeding journal, and inspiring Ã¢â‚¬Å“Mama MantrasÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ to help parents prepare meals that nurture their childrenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bodies, minds, and spirits. With photographs featuring delicious, healthy baby food and recipes that focus on a few basic fresh ingredients, Organically Raised makes cooking for babies and young toddlers easy and appealing to even the most inexperienced cook
